text.description:
Combined Kuertee's Attack AI Tweaks mod and DeadAIR's AI Tweaks mod.
Attack AI Tweaks: all ships avoid high-risk enemies, L/XL ships step forward on no damage, L/XL withdraw on damage. Read-me is below.
DeadAIRAITweaks: https://github.com/kuertee/x4-mod-da-ku-ai-tweaks/blob/master/deadairaitweaks-read-me.md
